title: Binance Now Allows Larger Traders to Keep Their Assets Elsewhere: FT
description: The move may reflect users' unease about Binance's regulatory dispute in the U.S. which saw it landed with a $4.3 billion fine in November.

title: Blockchain Technology Is ‘The Future of the Internet’, Says Andreessen Horowitz Partner Chris Dixon
description: Chris Dixon was interviewed by Andrew Ross Sorkin on CNBC’s “Squawk Box” on 29 January 2024. title: Revolutionizing Digital Asset Management Realm: Nuant and Aisot's Latest Partnership
description: In a groundbreaking move that seeks to radically transform the crypto landscape, Nuant, an established leader in risk management for institutional digital asset investors, recently announced a strategic partnership with Aisot Technologies, a company known for its artificial intelligence (AI) driven portfolio optimization system.

title: US Sanctions on Russia Similar to Planting a ‘Bomb Under the Dollar,’ Says Russian Analyst
description: The United States’ sanctions against Russia are undermining confidence in the U.S. dollar and may force other countries to ditch the currency, a Russian financial analyst has said. The analyst said contrary to the West expectations, the sanctions against Russia have failed to destroy its economy. Russia’s Frozen Assets According to Alexander Razuvaev, a Russian […]

title: German startup Semron’s Memcapacitors Set to Transform AI Processing
description: In a dynamic and rapidly evolving tech landscape, Semron, a German startup, is poised to disrupt the world of AI computing with its pioneering memcapacitor-based chips. Founded by engineering graduates Kai-Uwe Demasius and Aron Kirschen, Semron’s innovative approach promises higher energy efficiency and cost-effective AI processing for mobile devices.  Semron’s Memcapacitor technology Semron’s chips mark […]

title: Binance alerts users to rising exchange listing scams
description: Binance cryptocurrency exchange has warned about a resurgence of exchange listing scams. These increasingly sophisticated scams involve impersonators using the names of Binance’s high-profile individuals to offer fraudulent token listings for a fee. Rise of impersonation scams The resurgence of these scams was highlighted in a January 29th post by Yi He, a co-founder of […]

title: Neuralink Implants ‘Telepathy’ Device in Human Brain For First Time
description:
Tech billionaire Elon Musk recently announced the successful implantation of Neuralink’s brain-computer device in a human being. The device, which Musk has dubbed “Telepathy” supposedly assists thinking and enables telepathic control of mobile phones and computers. On January 29, Musk took to X to share insights on the promising experiment with Neuralink on a human […]
